trans-unit.source: An abstract base class used to create composite activities from pre-existing Activity objects.
trans-unit.target: 一个抽象基类用于从预先存在的活动对象创建复合活动。

trans-unit.source: Activity is the base class in the activity type hierarchy.
trans-unit.target: 活动是活动类型层次结构中的基类。

trans-unit.source: All other activity types such as <xref:System.Activities.CodeActivity>, <xref:System.Activities.NativeActivity>, <xref:System.Activities.AsyncCodeActivity>, <xref:System.Activities.DynamicActivity>, and <xref:System.Activities.ActivityWithResult> derive from this class.
trans-unit.target: 所有其他活动类型，如<xref:System.Activities.CodeActivity>， <xref:System.Activities.NativeActivity>， <xref:System.Activities.AsyncCodeActivity>， <xref:System.Activities.DynamicActivity>，并<xref:System.Activities.ActivityWithResult>从类派生</xref:System.Activities.ActivityWithResult></xref:System.Activities.DynamicActivity></xref:System.Activities.AsyncCodeActivity></xref:System.Activities.NativeActivity></xref:System.Activities.CodeActivity>

trans-unit.source: Initializes a new instance of the <xref href="System.Activities.Activity"></xref> class.
trans-unit.target: 初始化的新实例<xref href="System.Activities.Activity"></xref>类。

trans-unit.source: Gets the identifier of the cache that is unique within the scope of the workflow definition.
trans-unit.target: 获取在工作流定义的作用域内是唯一的缓存的标识符。

trans-unit.source: The identifier of the cache that is unique within the scope of the workflow definition.
trans-unit.target: 在工作流定义的作用域内是唯一的缓存的标识符。

trans-unit.source: Creates and validates a description of the activity’s arguments, variables, child activities, and activity delegates.
trans-unit.target: 创建并验证活动的自变量、 变量、 子活动和活动委托的说明。

trans-unit.source: The workflow runtime uses the default implementation of CacheMetadata to ensure correct construction of a workflow as well as to manage runtime relationships and lifetime rules.
trans-unit.target: 工作流运行时使用 CacheMetadata 的默认实现来确保正确构造流，以及管理运行时关系和生存期规则。

trans-unit.source: The default implementation of CacheMetadata examines the public properties of the activity type using the type’s <xref:System.ComponentModel.TypeDescriptor>.
trans-unit.target: 默认实现的 CacheMetadata 检查使用该类型的<xref:System.ComponentModel.TypeDescriptor>.</xref:System.ComponentModel.TypeDescriptor>活动类型的公共属性

trans-unit.source: These public members are of type <xref:System.Activities.Argument>, <xref:System.Activities.Variable>, [T:System.Collections.Generic.IEnumerable\<T:System.Activities.Variable>](~/add/includes/ajax-current-ext-md.md), <xref:System.Activities.Activity>, [T:System.Collections.Generic.IEnumerable\<T:System.Activities.Activity>](~/add/includes/ajax-current-ext-md.md), or <xref:System.Activities.ActivityDelegate>.
trans-unit.target: 这些公共成员的类型包括<xref:System.Activities.Argument>， <xref:System.Activities.Variable>， [T:System.Collections.Generic.IEnumerable\<T:System.Activities.Variable&1;>](~/add/includes/ajax-current-ext-md.md)， <xref:System.Activities.Activity>， [T:System.Collections.Generic.IEnumerable\<T:System.Activities.Activity&1;>](~/add/includes/ajax-current-ext-md.md)，或<xref:System.Activities.ActivityDelegate>。</xref:System.Activities.ActivityDelegate> </xref:System.Activities.Activity> </xref:System.Activities.Variable> </xref:System.Activities.Argument>

trans-unit.source: You can override this method to customize the building of the activity’s run-time description and to provide custom validation logic.
trans-unit.target: 你可以重写此方法可以自定义活动的运行时说明的生成，并提供自定义验证逻辑。

trans-unit.source: The activity’s metadata that encapsulates the activity’s arguments, variables, child activities, and activity delegates.
trans-unit.target: 封装活动的自变量、 变量、 子活动和活动委托的活动的元数据。

trans-unit.source: Gets a collection of <xref href="System.Activities.Validation.Constraint"></xref> activities that can be configured to provide validation for the <xref href="System.Activities.Activity"></xref>.
trans-unit.target: 获取的集合<xref href="System.Activities.Validation.Constraint"></xref>可以配置为用于验证的活动<xref href="System.Activities.Activity"> </xref>。

trans-unit.source: The collection of constraints.
trans-unit.target: 约束的集合。

trans-unit.source: Gets or sets an optional friendly name that is used for debugging, validation, exception handling, and tracking.
trans-unit.target: 获取或设置用于调试、 验证、 异常处理和跟踪的可选友好名称。

trans-unit.source: This property is read-only at runtime.
trans-unit.target: 此属性是在运行时以只读的。

trans-unit.source: A friendly name that is used for debugging, validation, exception handling, and tracking.
trans-unit.target: 一个用于调试、 验证、 异常处理和跟踪的友好名称。

trans-unit.source: Gets an identifier that is unique in the scope of the workflow definition.
trans-unit.target: 获取工作流定义的作用域内是唯一的标识符。

trans-unit.source: Id is used in tracking and validation.
trans-unit.target: 跟踪和验证使用 id。

trans-unit.source: An identifier that is unique in the scope of the workflow definition.
trans-unit.target: 工作流定义的作用域内是唯一的标识符。

trans-unit.source: Gets or sets the delegate that returns an <xref href="System.Activities.Activity"></xref> that contains the execution logic.
trans-unit.target: 获取或设置用于返回的委托<xref href="System.Activities.Activity"> </xref> ，其中包含执行逻辑。

trans-unit.source: The execution logic can be implemented as several Activity objects by containing them in a Sequence activity or other composite activity.
trans-unit.target: 通过将其包含在 Sequence 活动或其他复合活动中，可以作为多个 Activity 对象实现的执行逻辑。

trans-unit.source: The delegate that contains the execution logic.
trans-unit.target: 用于包含执行逻辑的委托。

trans-unit.source: Gets or sets the version of the implementation used.
trans-unit.target: 获取或设置使用的实现的版本。

trans-unit.source: The version of the implementation
trans-unit.target: 版本的实现

trans-unit.source: Raises an event when creating dynamic update map.
trans-unit.target: 引发事件时创建动态更新映射。

trans-unit.source: The metadata used.
trans-unit.target: 使用的元数据。

trans-unit.source: The original activity.
trans-unit.target: 原始的活动。

trans-unit.source: Indicates whether the <xref:System.Activities.Activity.DisplayName*> property should be serialized.
trans-unit.target: 指示是否<xref:System.Activities.Activity.DisplayName*>应序列化属性。</xref:System.Activities.Activity.DisplayName*>

trans-unit.source: <xref uid="langword_csharp_true" name="true" href=""></xref> if the <xref:System.Activities.Activity.DisplayName*> property value should be serialized; otherwise <xref uid="langword_csharp_false" name="false" href=""></xref>.
trans-unit.target: <xref uid="langword_csharp_true" name="true" href=""></xref>如果<xref:System.Activities.Activity.DisplayName*>属性值应序列化; 否则为<xref uid="langword_csharp_false" name="false" href=""> </xref>。</xref:System.Activities.Activity.DisplayName*>

trans-unit.source: Returns a <xref:System.String> that contains the <xref:System.Activities.Activity.Id*> and <xref:System.Activities.Activity.DisplayName*> of the <xref href="System.Activities.Activity"></xref>.
trans-unit.target: 返回<xref:System.String>包含<> *1> 和<> *1> 的<xref href="System.Activities.Activity"> </xref>。</xref:System.String>

trans-unit.source: The ID and the display name of the activity.
trans-unit.target: ID 和活动的显示名称。
